title: Chapter 725 - What A Lovely Head, Someone Ought To Chop It Off
body:
Chapter 725 - What A Lovely Head, Someone Ought To Chop It Off

Waves surged across the surface of the lake.

In the spot where Ye Fenghe died, blood dyed the water red, creating a wave of red.

A few blinks of the eye later, that smear of red faded and disappeared.

The onlookers watched in astonishment.

The battle was over almost as soon as it began.

Su Yi had cut down a mighty Spiritual Incarnation cultivator on the spot! 

Who wouldn’t have been surprised?

“Dammit!” Ye Changchun’s murderous intent was on full display.

Earlier, he’d been focused on preventing Ye Yunlan from interfering, so he hadn’t intervened. He’d assumed that Ye Xueting’s intervention would be enough to avert Ye Fenghe’s crisis.

Who’d have thought that Ye Fenghe would die in the end?

“His combat strength is far superior to Ye Yufei’s at his age,” sighed Ye Yunlan. He looked excited and gratified, but also grief-stricken and melancholy.

Ye Yufei had proved her Dao and entered the Spiritual Manifestation Realm at seventeen. The clan once saw her as the most peerless genius of its younger generation; her combat prowess would have dazzled whatever era she’d been born into. Throughout the Mysterious Blue continent, practically no one could stand shoulder-to-shoulder with her.

But Su Yi was obviously even stronger!

He’d killed...
original_title: Chapter 725 - What a Lovely Head, Someone Ought to Chop It Off
